Song.Title: When You Tell Me That You Love Me
Song.Source: {"data":[{"type":"audio","title":"When You Tell Me That You Love Me","performer":"Diana Ross","source":"http:\/\/m.mp3.zing.vn\/xml\/song-load\/MjAxMSUyRjEyJTJGMDMlMkY1JTJGZCUyRjVkZmRlMDNmYjdiMjA0OWZiMDVkZGY1OGExZDg3ZWY5Lm1wMyU3QzI=","hq":"require vip"}]}
Song.Lyrics:
I wanna call the stars
Down from the sky
I wanna live a day
That never dies
I wanna change the world
Only for you
All the impossible
I wanna do


I wanna hold you close
Under the rain
I wanna kiss you smile
And fell the pain
I know what's beautiful
Looking at you
In the world of lies
You are the truth

And baby
Everytime you touch me
I'll become a hero
I'll make you safe
No matter where you are
And bring you
Everything you ask for
Nothing is above me
I'm shining like a candle in the dark
When you tell me that you love me

I wanna make you see
Just what I was
Show you the loneliness
And what it does
You walked into my life
To stop my tears
Everything easy now
I have you here

And baby
Everytime you touch me
I'll become a hero
I'll make you safe
No matter where you are
And bring you
Everything you ask for
Nothing is above me
I'm shining like a candle in the dark
When you tell me that you love me

In a world without you
I would always hunger
All I need is your love to make me stronger

And baby
Everytime you touch me
I'll become a hero
I'll make you safe
No matter where you are
And bring you
Everything you ask for
Nothing is above me
I'm shining like a candle in the dark
When you tell me that you love me

You love me
When you tell me that you love me
